together note yo insert the hook in the stitch yo and pull up a loop yo and pull through 2 loops yo insert hook in next stitch pull up a loop yo pull through 2 loops 3 loops on the hook yo pull through all loops decrease made fp-dc3tog front post double_crochet three together note *yo insert the hook in the indicated stitch yo and pull up a loop yo and pull through 2 loops* 2 loops on the hook repeat * * 3 loops on the hook repeat * * 1 more time 4 loops on the hook yo and pull through all the loops fp-dc3tog made fp-slip_stitch front post slip_stitch bp-slip_stitch back post slip_stitch split fp-tc2tog front post treble two stitches together note 1st leg-yo 2 times insert hook in indicated space yo pull up a loop yo pull through 2 loops yo pull through 2 loops do not complete the stitch 2nd leg yo 2 times insert hook in indicated space yo pull up a loop yo pull through 2 loops yo pull through 2 loops yo and pull through all loops split fp-tc2tog made small picot round 9 chain 3 slip_stitch on top of the single_crochet made round 23 chain 3 slip_stitch into the 3rd chain from the hook chain 1 leilani designed by ramalakshmi pasumarthy 2 row pattern stitches start with chain 4 slip_stitch in the 1st chain to form a ring 1 chain 1 8 single_crochet into the ring slip_stitch into 1st single_crochet to join 8 single_crochet 2 chain 1 2 single_crochet in the same st 2 single_crochet in each of the 16 single_crochet remaining 7 single_crochet slip_stitch into 1st single_crochet to join 3 chain 1 single_crochet in same st chain 7 single_crochet in next st as 1st 40 double_crochet double_crochet 4 double_crochet in same chain space *mark the chain space after the double_crochet as 1 mark the beginning of next chain space as 2 5 double_crochet in next
